{{also|januar|janúar|január}} ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|Jänner}} ===Etymology=== From {{der|de|la|iānuārius}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈjanuaːr/|/ˈjanuaː(ɐ̯)/}} {{a|standard}} * {{IPA|de|/ˈjanʊɐ̯/|/ˈjaːnʊɐ̯/}} {{a|colloquial, regional}} * {{audio|de|De-Januar.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Januars|gen2=Januar|Januare}} # [[January]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(s)|e}} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|bor=1|et|jaanuar}} * {{desc|bor=1|he|יָנוּאָר|tr=yánuar}} * {{desc|bor=1|yi|יאַנואַר}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Months]] ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/ˈja(ː)nuaː/}} ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=m|plural|Januar}} # [[January]] #: {{ux|hrx|In '''Januar''' is-es immer aarich heis.|It's always very hot in '''January'''.}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary] [[Category:hrx:Months]] ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Etymology=== From {{der|lb|de|Januar}}, from {{der|lb|la|ianuarius}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/ˈja.nuˌaː(ʀ)/|[ˈjɑ.nuˌaː(χ)]}} ===Noun=== {{lb-noun|m}} # [[January]] ===See also=== * {{list:Gregorian calendar months/lb}} ---- ==Scots== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|sco|enm|Januarie}}, {{m|enm|januari}}, re-latinised forms of {{cog|enm|Janevere}}, {{m|enm|Ieneuer}}, from {{der|sco|xno|genever}}, from {{der|sco|la|iānuārius||(month) of [[Janus]]}}, perhaps from a {{der|sco|ine-pro|*h₁ey-||to go|pos=a root}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|sco|[ˈdʒanwər]}} ===Proper noun=== {{sco-proper noun}} # [[January]] ===See also=== * {{list:Gregorian calendar months/sco}} [[Category:sco:Months]]
